author: trackreco
body:
#### PR description:

This PR follows #35199 and updates mkFit in view of CMSSW_12_1_0_pre4.

In detail, this PR includes technical update of mkFit configurations.
Via  cms-sw/cmsdist#7349 and cms-data/RecoTracker-MkFit#5 it includes updates to improve tracking performance, presented in detail at the [Tracker DPG - Tracking POG general meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/992975/?showDate=all&showSession=all#8-mkfit-status-and-plans).

It requires cms-sw/cmsdist#7349 and cms-data/RecoTracker-MkFit#5


#### PR validation:

Performance has been presented in detail at the [Tracker DPG - Tracking POG general meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/992975/?showDate=all&showSession=all#8-mkfit-status-and-plans)

Full MTV results in TTbar events with PU (Run-3, 2021) are available:
http://uaf-10.t2.ucsd.edu/~mmasciov/MkFit_devs/TrackerDPGValidation/MTV_mkFit-7iter_pre4_plusCKF_Sep27/
title: Update of mkFit for 12_1_0_pre4
